participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and quirky, always looking for the fun side of life.
participant_1.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Curious and passionate about learning, often dives into new cultures.
participant_2.background: i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.
